verses.name: Leviticus 15:5
verses.text: And whosoever toucheth his bed shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:6
verses.text: And he that sitteth on any thing whereon he sat that hath the issue shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 15:7
verses.text: And he that toucheth the flesh of him that hath the issue shall wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and be unclean until the even.
